effect: Additive serotonergic effect and CYP3A4 induction; risk of serotonin syndrome
Grapefruit inhibits CYP3A4 leading to increased statin levels and risk of myopathy
Ginkgo may increase bleeding risk when combined with warfarin
St John's Wort may reduce warfarin levels leading to decreased anticoagulant effect
Potential increased serotonergic activity and bleeding risk
Possible increased bleeding risk due to additive anticoagulant effects
